title: Something is wrong with accounts?
body:
I have been playing League of Legends for a while now, but on the 8th of December, 2016 my account "Divals" got "hacked" into, I have tried sending recovery emails to change my password but none of them get to my email. ( I don't receive them ) I had full control over my account before it got "hacked" I have 2 other friends that are experiencing the  same problem too, ( Hacked & Not Receiving Emails ) I don't know if this is just a glitch or i if really got hacked into. But if anybody else is experiencing this please let Riot know.

Cheers,
Merooka.

replies.body:
Ooof, I hope you didn't end up clicking on one of those phishing links disguised as "Riot Holiday RP Giveaways". We can certainly assist you in recovering your account, but we'll need you to submit a support ticket using [**this form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and provide *as much information* as possible.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I am one of the friends in case you want to know.(Just ask him if you don't believe me)
